responses.start: Welcome to ivelchat. Here you can chat with real chat bots. To add a bot, click on 'Add a new bot' on the left side on your screen. You can add every available chatbot. On the menu on the left, you can change the current chatbot. To remove a chatbot, click on the little 'x' near the chatbots name. For further settings, click on the '⚙' - Icon in the top left. If you need further help, type 'help'. Have fun! :D
